postReview.title: Everton 2-0 Brighton: Grealish destaca en un comienzo prometedor en el estadio Hill Dickinson
postReview.description: Iliman Ndiaye y James Garner anotaron y Jack Grealish asistió en ambos goles mientras Everton ganaba su primer partido de liga en el estadio Hill Dickinson.

postReview.title: Everton 2-0 Brighton: Grealish brilla nell'inizio volante all'Hill Dickinson Stadium
postReview.description: Iliman Ndiaye e James Garner hanno segnato e Jack Grealish ha avviato entrambi i gol mentre l'Everton ha vinto la sua prima partita di campionato all'Hill Dickinson Stadium.

postReview.title: Everton 2-0 Brighton: Grealish stars in flying start at Hill Dickinson Stadium
postReview.description: Iliman Ndiaye and James Garner scored and Jack Grealish set up both goals as Everton won their first league game at Hill Dickinson Stadium.

postReview.title: Everton 2-0 Brighton: Grealish brilha em início promissor no Estádio Hill Dickinson
postReview.description: Iliman Ndiaye e James Garner marcaram e Jack Grealish deu assistência para ambos os gols enquanto o Everton venceu seu primeiro jogo de liga no Estádio Hill Dickinson.

postReview.title: Everton 2-0 Brighton: Grealish glänzt bei einem furiosen Start im Hill Dickinson Stadium
postReview.description: Iliman Ndiaye und James Garner erzielten die Tore und Jack Grealish bereitete beide Treffer vor, als Everton ihr erstes Ligaspiel im Hill Dickinson Stadium gewann.

postReview.title: Everton 2-0 Brighton : Grealish brille dans un départ fulgurant au Hill Dickinson Stadium
postReview.description: Iliman Ndiaye et James Garner ont marqué et Jack Grealish a mis en place les deux buts alors qu'Everton remportait son premier match de championnat au Hill Dickinson Stadium.

postReview.title: إيفرتون 2-0 برايتون: جريليش يتألق في بداية طائرة في استاد هيل ديكنسون
postReview.description: سجل إيلمان نداي وجيمس غارنر وصنع جاك جريليش الهدفين حيث فاز إيفرتون بأول مباراة له في الدوري في استاد هيل ديكنسون.

postReview.title: Everton 2-0 Brighton: Grealish brilha em início espetacular no Hill Dickinson Stadium
postReview.description: Iliman Ndiaye e James Garner marcaram, e Jack Grealish deu assistência para ambos os gols na vitória do Everton em seu primeiro jogo na liga no Hill Dickinson Stadium.

preReview.title: Moyes disfrutando del primer partido de la Premier League en el Hill Dickinson Stadium
preReview.description: Everton jugará su primer partido de la Premier League en el Hill Dickinson Stadium cuando reciban al Brighton el domingo.

preReview.title: Moyes relishing first Premier League game at Hill Dickinson Stadium
preReview.description: Everton will play their first Premier League match at Hill Dickinson Stadium when they host Brighton on Sunday.

preReview.title: Moyes si prepara con entusiasmo alla prima partita di Premier League al Hill Dickinson Stadium
preReview.description: L'Everton giocherà la sua prima partita di Premier League al Hill Dickinson Stadium quando ospiteranno il Brighton domenica.

preReview.title: Moyes ansioso pelo primeiro jogo da Premier League no Hill Dickinson Stadium
preReview.description: O Everton jogará sua primeira partida da Premier League no Hill Dickinson Stadium quando receber o Brighton no domingo.

preReview.title: Moyes se réjouit du premier match de Premier League au Hill Dickinson Stadium
preReview.description: Everton jouera son premier match de Premier League au Hill Dickinson Stadium en accueillant Brighton dimanche.

preReview.title: Moyes freut sich auf das erste Premier-League-Spiel im Hill Dickinson Stadium
preReview.description: Everton wird sein erstes Premier-League-Spiel im Hill Dickinson Stadium bestreiten, wenn sie am Sonntag Brighton empfangen.

preReview.title: مويس يتطلع لأول مباراة في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز في ملعب هيل ديكنسون
preReview.description: سيلعب إيفرتون أول مباراة له في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز في ملعب هيل ديكنسون عندما يستضيف برايتون يوم الأحد.

preReview.title: Moyes aprecia o primeiro jogo da Premier League no Estádio Hill Dickinson
preReview.description: O Everton jogará sua primeira partida da Premier League no Estádio Hill Dickinson, quando receberá o Brighton no domingo.

QAData.question: Who won between Everton and Brighton & Hove Albion on Sun, 24 Aug 2025 13:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Everton won 2–0 over Brighton & Hove Albion on Sun, 24 Aug 2025 13:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Danny Welbeck has the least touches (22) of any outfield player.
Lewis Dunk completed the most passes (92) in the match.
Jordan Pickford was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.1.
Kaoru Mitoma hit the woodwork 1 times in 1 total shots.
Matthew O'Riley is the most accurate passer (94%) in the match.
Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall committed a foul leading to a penalty for Brighton & Hove Albion.
Mats Wieffer won the most duels (10) in the match.
Yankuba Minteh completed the most dribbles (5) in the match.
